spots.name: The 3rd Grind
spots.description: A trendy coffee shop with a wide variety of specialty coffees and pastries.

reviews.name: Fatima
reviews.text: Best coffee in Riyadh! Love the cozy atmosphere.

reviews.name: Ahmed
reviews.text: Great place for breakfast meetings. Pastries are delicious.

spots.name: Takya Bistro
spots.description: An upscale bistro offering a unique blend of local and international cuisines.

reviews.name: Noura
reviews.text: Exquisite fusion cuisine! Perfect for a romantic dinner.

reviews.name: Abdullah
reviews.text: Innovative dishes and great ambiance. A bit pricey but worth it.

spots.name: The Zone
spots.description: A modern entertainment complex with shops, restaurants, and a multiplex cinema.

reviews.name: Aisha
reviews.text: Great place for family outings. Lots of options for everyone.

reviews.name: Yasser
reviews.text: Love the cinema here! Always a fun time.

spots.name: Riyadh Front
spots.description: A high-end shopping destination featuring international brands and gourmet restaurants.

reviews.name: Hana
reviews.text: Shopping paradise! All my favorite luxury brands in one place.

reviews.name: Majid
reviews.text: Impressive selection of stores. The restaurants are top-notch too.

spots.name: Diriyah Oasis
spots.description: A beautifully restored historical area offering a glimpse into traditional Saudi culture.

reviews.name: Turki
reviews.text: A must-visit to understand Saudi history and culture!

reviews.name: Nora
reviews.text: Beautiful restoration work, very informative guides.

spots.name: Elixir Bunn Coffee Roasters
spots.description: A specialty coffee shop known for its in-house roasted beans and excellent brunch menu.

reviews.name: Leila
reviews.text: The best specialty coffee in Riyadh! Their pour-over is exceptional.

reviews.name: Fahad
reviews.text: Great atmosphere for working or meeting friends. Brunch menu is delicious.

spots.name: Roka Riyadh
spots.description: An award-winning Japanese robata restaurant offering a unique dining experience.

reviews.name: Yousef
reviews.text: Exceptional Japanese cuisine! The robata grill items are a must-try.

reviews.name: Rania
reviews.text: Impeccable service and ambiance. Perfect for special occasions.

spots.name: Urth Caffe
spots.description: A popular cafe chain from LA, known for its organic coffee and health-conscious menu.

reviews.name: Lama
reviews.text: Love their green tea latte and avocado toast. Great for a casual lunch.

reviews.name: Adel
reviews.text: The Spanish latte is amazing! Nice outdoor seating area too.
